## ILocalizedData interface

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface ILocalizedData
```

## Properties

| Property                                                                                                             | Modifiers | Type                                                                                                                                         | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
| -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [defaultLocale](./webpack4-localization-plugin.ilocalizeddata.defaultlocale.md)                                      |           | [IDefaultLocaleOptions](./webpack4-localization-plugin.idefaultlocaleoptions.md)                                                             | Options for the locale used in the source localized data files.                                                                                                                                                         |
| [ignoreMissingResxComments?](./webpack4-localization-plugin.ilocalizeddata.ignoremissingresxcomments.md)             |           | boolean                                                                                                                                      | <i>(Optional)</i> If set to true, do not warn on missing RESX <code>&lt;data&gt;</code> element comments.                                                                                                               |
| [normalizeResxNewlines?](./webpack4-localization-plugin.ilocalizeddata.normalizeresxnewlines.md)                     |           | 'lf' \| 'crlf'                                                                                                                               | <i>(Optional)</i> Normalize newlines in RESX files to either CRLF (Windows-style) or LF ('nix style)                                                                                                                    |
| [passthroughLocale?](./webpack4-localization-plugin.ilocalizeddata.passthroughlocale.md)                             |           | [IPassthroughLocaleOptions](./webpack4-localization-plugin.ipassthroughlocaleoptions.md)                                                     | <i>(Optional)</i> Options around including a passthrough locale.                                                                                                                                                        |
| [pseudolocales?](./webpack4-localization-plugin.ilocalizeddata.pseudolocales.md)                                     |           | [IPseudolocalesOptions](./webpack4-localization-plugin.ipseudolocalesoptions.md)                                                             | <i>(Optional)</i> Options for pseudo-localization.                                                                                                                                                                      |
| [resolveMissingTranslatedStrings?](./webpack4-localization-plugin.ilocalizeddata.resolvemissingtranslatedstrings.md) |           | (locales: string\[\], filePath: string) =&gt; [IResolvedMissingTranslations](./webpack4-localization-plugin.iresolvedmissingtranslations.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> Use this parameter to specify a function used to load translations missing from the [ILocalizedData.translatedStrings](./webpack4-localization-plugin.ilocalizeddata.translatedstrings.md) parameter. |
| [translatedStrings](./webpack4-localization-plugin.ilocalizeddata.translatedstrings.md)                              |           | [ILocalizedStrings](./webpack4-localization-plugin.ilocalizedstrings.md)                                                                     | Use this parameter to specify the translated data.                                                                                                                                                                      |
